variants.Description in input context: I2020T mutation in LRRK2 associated with Parkinson’s disease (PD), located in the activation loop of the kinase domain, exhibits altered ATP affinity and kinase inhibitor sensitivity

G2019S mutation in LRRK2 associated with Parkinson’s disease (PD), located in the activation loop of the kinase domain, exhibits altered ATP affinity and kinase inhibitor sensitivity; most common genetic cause of PD
